name: VR Robots Adventure:3D Fantasy
description:
This interactive game will help you to travel into the colorful cartoon world, full of surprises, interesting tasks and sharp turns. Both players and robots, which fly in the spherical capsule and compete with each other in gathering points for different tasks. The winner only one! Take a dive into an unforgettable robots adventure!

VR Robots Adventure:3D Fantasy is compatible with all virtual reality devices:
Homido VR
Archos VR
Dive VR
FreeFly VR
FIBRUM VR
Cmoar
Vrase
Zeiss VR One
Lick VR
